projects.title: Graphing Calculator
projects.description: A C++ desktop app built with SFML for plotting and exploring mathematical functions using an interactive, real-time graphing interface.

projects.title: DSA Visualizer
projects.description: A collection of interactive C++ projects showcasing advanced data structures and algorithms—like backtracking, A* search, heaps, and DFAs—visualized using SFML and the Malena framework.

projects.title: Gabe's Arcade
projects.description: A collection of classic arcade games like Snake, Tetris, and Pong, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring interactive gameplay and nostalgic design.

projects.title: Blackjack
projects.description: A simple web-based Blackjack game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring interactive gameplay and traditional casino rules.

projects.title: Random Song Generator
projects.description: A Python app that uses the Spotify API to generate popular songs by genre with a simple Tkinter interface.

projects.title: Bookstore Management System
projects.description: A Java Swing–based GUI application that uses object-oriented programming (OOP) principles to manage an online bookstore, with modular classes for inventory, customers, orders, and payments.
